title: The blemish of government, the shame of religion, the disgrace of mankind, or, A charge drawn up against drunkards and presented to His Highness the Lord Protector, in the name of all the Sober Party in the three nations, humbly craving that they may be kept alone by themselves from infecting others ... / by R. Younge of Roxwell in Essex.
author: Younge, Richard.
publisher: Printed by A.M. and are to be sold by Henry Crips ... and James Crump ...,
